main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted by members of the 12th Weather Squadron at Niagara Falls Airport on 7 June 1951.
interesting points: The object was described as larger and brighter than typical jet aircraft wings., It exhibited vertical movement and oscillating motion., The sighting lasted approximately 20-30 seconds., The object disappeared into the overcast and reappeared suddenly during the observation., No trail, exhaust, or sound was noted during the sighting.
witness description: members of the 12th Weather Squadron, including W/Sgt. and two airmen
